2.title: Disclaimers:
2.text: The website is not intended to offer investment services to citizens of certain jurisdictions such as EU/EEA member states, UK, USA, Canada, Australia, New Zealand, FATF-listed countries including, among others, Iran, North Korea, and Myanmar (Burma).
